content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Plate Production Facility at Position (-15.0, -49.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone Furnace at position (-15.0, -49.0) with a fuel inventory of coal and currently working status. It processes iron ore into iron plates.

### Coal Mining and Transport System at Position (42.0, -83.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (42.0, -83.0) which is currently out of fuel and has its output blocked by an item on the ground.
- Burner Inserter at position (42.5, -81.5) which is waiting for source items and is connected to the mining drill and transport belts.
- BeltGroup connecting the inserter to a chest, consisting of belts at positions (43.5, -82.5) to (43.5, -80.5) and (43.5, -81.5) to (43.5, -79.5), facilitating the movement of items.

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when placing entities on occupied tiles
- Ensure the target tile is free of other entities before attempting to place a new entity, such as a wooden chest.

### Errors with insufficient inventory items
- Always check your inventory for required items, like transport belts, before attempting to connect entities. Craft or acquire the necessary items if they are not available.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when connecting entities with transport belts
- Verify that you have the necessary transport belts in your inventory before attempting to connect entities with them.
